Articles.Content:
![vN69TSn.png](http://i.imgur.com/vN69TSn.png)

Totally not a Special Agent now! I am now working as a spaceshuttle and spaceplane devoloper (Talking to dude next to me: I am going to plant bombs in them, hehe) Anyways! These will be almost impossible to crash, that is, if you a experienced flyer like me.

My ships: [https://www.dropbox.com/sh/21sa9chv8c4msya/AADK6pe5t0rp1G3ER4iaLCkXa?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/21sa9chv8c4msya/AADK6pe5t0rp1G3ER4iaLCkXa?dl=0)

Some may require cheats or Hyperedit to work.

Modded planes: Aeris 3A Armed (requires Procedual Parts)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-27T06:45:38Z" title="02/27/2015 06:45  AM" data-short="9 yr">February 27, 2015</time> by Kirrim**
seems interesting. If you want or need a test pilot to help make these things more stable, I might know of some people or would be happy to help in any way I can!
Cool! I need the rockets to not point diff directions
